tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Get ready to read (2)  Caring (1)  Participation matters (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
stu_tags: TOUGH GRADER  GET READY TO READ  PARTICIPATION MATTERS
comments: He\'s a talker and sometimes the things he says make little to no sense. Be prepared to put A LOT of money onto your print card to prepare to print all the things you\'ll need to \'read\' and bring to class.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Get ready to read (2)  Caring (1)  Participation matters (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
stu_tags: CARING  TOUGH GRADER  GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK
comments: Super hot, and genuinely cares about his students. I sometimes found he was on a different wave length in discussions and seemed to have an agenda or personal opinion he was pushing rather than letting the students explore the ideas independently. I like him as a person, not sure I\'d take a class of his again.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Get ready to read (2)  Caring (1)  Participation matters (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: The professor has been challenging, but also shows a deep capacity for empathy & is willing to be challenged as well. As a student of color I\'ve found his classes engaging & felt respected & valued- even while we dealt with topics of class & global identity. I have tremendous respect for him esp b/c he is courageous enough to admit when he\'s wrong.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Get ready to read (2)  Caring (1)  Participation matters (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: He is definitely qualified to do his job, however, do not take his class if you are expecting something easy. He grades papers relatively hard. Do not come to his class unprepared, he will embarrass you and use you as the example of what not to do. He is very passionate and engaged in his teaching and expects the same interest from you.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Get ready to read (2)  Caring (1)  Participation matters (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: VERY difficult writing professor. It\'s worth it tho, as you will learn more in this class than pretty much any other. He\'s brilliant. Totally knows his stuff and EXPECTS you to as well. Do not try to bs his, he will call you on it in class. He\'s funny tho and class is enjoyable, but a expect a lot of work.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Get ready to read (2)  Caring (1)  Participation matters (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Jason is an awesome Professor - energetic, cool, and friendly. He also is very helpful, and tries to understand each student\'s situation. His class is not a easy though, and you should only take his class if you are willing to work hard.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Get ready to read (2)  Caring (1)  Participation matters (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: You should definitely take his class - if you\'re prepared to try. Otherwise he will not have patience with you. He can always detect bs. However, if you do your best he will be very supportive, and he really knows what he\'s teaching. Good writing skills are a must-have.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Get ready to read (2)  Caring (1)  Participation matters (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: I wasn\'t quite sure what to think of him when I first took his class, but I quickly learned just how much he knew. Don\'t try and bs his class, he\'ll know the difference. Very passionate and overall kickass, this man knows his stuff.I\'m glad I got to learn from him.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Get ready to read (2)  Caring (1)  Participation matters (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: This man knows his stuff. And he is HOT. He is passionate about teaching. He grades hard, but fair. Oh, and did I say he is HOT

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Get ready to read (2)  Caring (1)  Participation matters (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: He\'ll make you work. You\'ll read nearly every day, and you\'ll probably have to turn in 3"x5" cards every day with quotes and comments written on them. He grades papers relatively severely. Good classroom energy. Sometimes insulting or cocky. Frankly, he can be an ass.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Get ready to read (2)  Caring (1)  Participation matters (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
Tough Grader (2)  Get ready to read (2)  Caring (1)  Participation matters (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Wow, what a hottie! Senior Sem was OK, but I thought that he is a little confused about where he stands as a professor, a little useless in some areas (but great comments in ANYTHING in writing- very helpful and well-spoken).
